name: Aim Hero
description: Aim Hero is an ultimate solution for practicing firing accuracy to do better in FPS games.<h3>Features:</h3><ul><li>Mouse sensitivity settings imported from popular games;<br/></li><li>More than 8 training modes, 3 difficulty levels each (We are going to add 5 modes in few weeks);<br/></li><li>Detailed statistics is provided as each training is completed;<br/></li><li>The best scores are saved automatically;</li></ul><h3>Games you may use to set your mouse sensitivity:</h3><ul><li>Counter-Strike: Global Offensive;<br/></li><li>Overwatch;<br/></li><li>PUBG;<br/></li><li>Fortnite;<br/></li><li>Paladins;<br/></li><li>Rainbow Six Siege;<br/></li><li>Quake Champions.</li></ul><br/>We are going to add more games on the list.
